channel.title: Design in Progress. Ideas? Comments?
channel.description:
Ok I am a huge Gears of War/Gears of War 2 fan. And I have decided to make my first model. And they are going to be Gears of War/Gears of War 2 items. So far I have the ideas of making the COG tags (necklace/ammy space) and the Torque Bow (bow space.) Here are some pictures I found on Google that I will be using along the way.
COG Tags: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/x5d1dc.jpg[/img]
Torque Bow: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9t2wbd.jpg[/img]
Torque bow (In Use): [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2yjwrv6.jpg[/img]
Anybody have any ideas? Suggestions? Or Comments?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 08:31:28 am[/size][hr][quote="Da 0wnz"]Ok I am a huge Gears of War/Gears of War 2 fan. And I have decided to make my first model. And they are going to be Gears of War/Gears of War 2 items. So far I have the ideas of making the COG tags (necklace/ammy space) and the Torque Bow (bow space.) Here are some pictures I found on Google that I will be using along the way.
COG Tags: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/x5d1dc.jpg[/img]
Torque Bow: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9t2wbd.jpg[/img]
Torque bow (In Use): [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2yjwrv6.jpg[/img]
Anybody have any ideas? Suggestions? Or Comments?[/quote] I'll be updating this thread along the way when I actually do something with these.

item.title: Design in Progress. Ideas? Comments?
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

COG tags will be easy to make, but the bow thing, you should make it a little simpler and on use-mode… not when it is folded up…

i suggest starting out with a cross-bow and making it more like a regularbow, so it has the gun-type look with some bow in it…

Read full topic

item.title: Design in Progress. Ideas? Comments?
item.dc:creator: @senne_teddy senne teddy
item.description:
@senne_teddy wrote:

i would do it, but im buzy with my 30th age armour for the contest
